text: $(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Electrocutes Zombies. Targets any Zombie. Spawns uncommonly. Drops Elec Plant Food.

$(br)$(#bd951a)"My uncle used to say 'With great power comes great responsibility.' Took the lesson to heart: charging criminals, helping power plants... but I'm not powerful enough, I was shocked about this truth."

pages.text: $(#25228d)Zapricot electrocutes zombies and their Electric Plant Food makes shocking plants.
